attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The demographics of our population is taking a major shift to the old generation being the most popular.  Amongst areas of society that this is noticable is on the roads.  
This petition is to have the DVLA enforce the age limitations and re-testing of aged as they becoming a danger to themselves and others on the road.  The amount of accidents being caused by the old where innocent families are loosing loved ones is on the increase and this will set to remain so unless we do somthing about it.  It will also go some way in further reducing the amount of road users.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
